data.full_email_body:
Hi there,

Noticed your team is expanding support efforts at [Company Name], which often means juggling more tickets and tighter response times. That kind of growth can make maintaining consistent quality a real headache.

At Intryc, we've helped support teams automate sampling and evaluation, reducing manual work and catching issues faster. Our AI-powered tools give real-time insights and customizable scorecards, making it easier to keep support standards high without extra hassle.

Would you be open to a quick chat about how this might help streamline your workflows?

Best,
[Your Name]
